root: ^Why is this maze so well preserved? It was built hundreds of years ago.
^This maze was built to safety store something. Right after construction it was sealed up and no one set foot here.
^So this means you are looking for something more precious than that Apate statue?
^Yes, Apate is, probably, one of the keys. I surmise there have to be more statues.
^How did you become a seeker of relics?
^He used to tell you a lot about his expeditions?
^Right. And how did you become an ancient Greece fanatic?
^Oh, that's a long story. I'll tell you about it some other time.
